project-challenges: Protection was a big deal. This app had to be incredibly secure. That meant protecting against SQL injection and XSS, but it also meant using things like certificate pinning. Besides protection, design was a bit of an issue; making you app look good while you're being forced to use a lot of orange (the color of ING) was pretty difficult sometimes.
project-subtitle: Super easy to use iPad app that displays financial data from your company

team.participant-bubble: Worked on API, webportal, iOS app. Designed everything.
